Module src
Package BoardDrawingGame.view

Class GUI2

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
BoardDrawingGame.view.GUI2
All Implemented Interfaces:
MoveMadeListener, ClientListener, ClientListenerGUI
public class GUI2 extends javafx.application.Application implements MoveMadeListener, ClientListenerGUI, ClientListener
The DotsAndBoxesGUI class represents the graphical user interface for the Dots and Boxes game. It extends the JavaFX Application class and implements the MoveMadeListener interface.
Author:
Ali Kaan Uysal, Bas Van Dijk

    • callAIMoveForServer

      public void callAIMoveForServer()
      Description copied from interface: ClientListenerGUI
      Initiates the process for the AI (Artificial Intelligence) to make a move in the game. This method is called when the client needs to request a move from the AI for the server.
      Specified by:
      callAIMoveForServer in interface ClientListenerGUI
